package chapter1;

public class homework3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int a = 1;
		int b = 1;
		int c;
		
		for(int i=0; i<20; i++) {
			c = a + b;
			System.out.println((double)b / a);
			a = b;
			b = c;
		}

	}

}
/*출력형태1.0
2.0
1.5
1.6666666666666667
1.6
1.625
1.6153846153846154
1.619047619047619
1.6176470588235294
